item.title: Some Thoughts on Using Event Sourcing
item.author: rayspock@protonmail.com (rayspock)
item.description: Photo by Hasnain Sikora on Unsplash About a year ago, I started to work with event sourcing and built a system around it. It seemed quite new to me, but the more I learned, the easier it became. Basically, I’ve already worked with event sourcing for my entire career as a software engineer even starting at school, however, I didn’t realise it at that time. As long as you have coding experience you should be able to work with version control systems such as Git, which enables event sourcing.
